leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算化学-量化计算与工作流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 求解→批量运行→解析/后处理→验证→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 求解器 + 工作流/调度 + 解析器

tools.name: JittorGeometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph machine learning library based on Jittor framework
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning library built on Jittor, enabling efficient graph neural network (GNN) construction and training for structured data analysis, often used in molecular modeling.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Selection And Prediction tools for materials and molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing and visualizing datasets of crystal or molecular structures, providing tools for dimensionality reduction, clustering, and descriptor generation.

tools.name: Geogram
tools.one_line_profile: Programming library of geometric algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library providing geometric algorithms such as mesh generation, remeshing, and Voronoi tessellation, serving as foundational infrastructure for scientific simulation and visualization.

tools.name: HyperTools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for geometric insights into high-dimensional data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for visualizing and manipulating high-dimensional data, designed to reveal geometric structures in complex datasets, widely used in neuroscience and behavioral analysis.

tools.name: tf_geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network Library for TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: An efficient and friendly Graph Neural Network (GNN) library for TensorFlow, supporting message passing strategies for molecular and network data analysis.

tools.name: SMILES-X
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous molecular characterization tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for the autonomous characterization of molecular compounds and property prediction directly from SMILES strings without manual descriptor engineering.

tools.name: EquiBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein-ligand binding prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model for fast and accurate prediction of the 3D structure of protein-ligand complexes (docking), leveraging SE(3)-equivariance.

tools.name: BasisSets.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface for Basis Set Exchange
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package to parse and manage quantum chemistry basis sets from the Basis Set Exchange API, facilitating electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: PodPals
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for ORCA computational chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: A Graphical User Interface designed to streamline the creation of input files and analysis of output files generated by the ORCA quantum chemistry software.

tools.name: DFTK.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Density-functional toolkit in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A library of Julia algorithms for playing with plane-wave density-functional theory (DFT), providing a flexible platform for electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: GeometryOptimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry optimization for molecular simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing algorithms for geometry optimization in molecular simulations, designed to work with various potential energy surface providers.

tools.name: MaSIF
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Surface Interaction Fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework to decipher patterns in molecular surfaces, enabling the prediction of protein-protein interactions and ligand binding based on surface geometry and chemistry.

tools.name: benchmarkff
tools.one_line_profile: Force field benchmarking tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compare optimized geometries and energies from various molecular force fields against Quantum Mechanics (QM) reference data, facilitating force field validation.

tools.name: basis_set_exchange
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for quantum chemistry basis sets
tools.detailed_description: A library to access and manage the Basis Set Exchange (BSE) data, providing a unified interface for retrieving basis sets for quantum chemical calculations.

tools.name: QCFractal
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed compute and database platform for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A distributed computing platform and database designed for quantum chemistry, enabling the orchestration of large-scale calculation workflows and data management.

tools.name: QCManyBody
tools.one_line_profile: Many-body expansion with QCArchive integration
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing intermolecular many-body expansion calculations, integrated with the QCArchive ecosystem for data handling.

tools.name: QCPortal
tools.one_line_profile: Client interface to QCArchive
tools.detailed_description: The client-side library for accessing and interacting with the QCArchive project and QCFractal instances, allowing users to query data and submit calculations.

tools.name: ORNL Molecular Datasets Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for large-scale molecular dataset generation
tools.detailed_description: A distributed computing workflow developed by ORNL for the generation and analysis of large-scale molecular datasets using multi-fidelity quantum chemical calculations.

tools.name: CIDER
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical Dataset Comparator
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and workflow for comparing chemical structure datasets, analyzing aspects like size, overlap, descriptor distributions, and chemical space clustering.

tools.name: lohi_splitter
tools.one_line_profile: Lo-Hi Splitter for molecular datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool for creating scaffold-based splits (Lo-Hi) for molecular machine learning datasets, ensuring robust benchmarking and validation of models.

tools.name: Samβada
tools.one_line_profile: Landscape genomic analysis software
tools.detailed_description: Integrated software for landscape genomic analysis, focusing on local adaptation in relationship with environment and spatial autocorrelation in molecular datasets.

tools.name: EMSL_Basis_Set_Exchange_Local
tools.one_line_profile: Local API client for the EMSL Basis Set Exchange
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to create a local copy of the EMSL Basis Set Exchange database, providing an API for scripting and offline access to basis sets for quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: MDV
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Dimensional Visualization toolkit for molecular datasets
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit for analyzing and visualizing spatial and molecular datasets, facilitating the exploration of multi-dimensional scientific data.

tools.name: Metric3D
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot metric 3D prediction from a single image
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for estimating metric 3D structures from single images, useful for geometric reconstruction and spatial analysis in computer vision.

tools.name: pyHGT
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Heterogeneous Graph Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch Geometric based implementation of the Heterogeneous Graph Transformer, widely used for modeling complex scientific data represented as heterogeneous graphs.

tools.name: AMLP
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tool for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive workflow tool integrating dataset creation, input/output handling, and analysis for machine learning interatomic potentials, supporting VASP, CP2K, and Gaussian.

tools.name: ANI1x_datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Datasets for organic molecules with DFT and CC properties
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing the ANI-1ccx and ANI-1x datasets, providing high-quality coupled-cluster and density functional theory properties for organic molecules for ML training.

tools.name: ChemTreeMap
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization of biochemical similarity
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating interactive maps of biochemical similarity in molecular datasets, aiding in the exploration of chemical space.

tools.name: 3dmatch-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: 3D ConvNet-based geometric descriptor for mesh alignment
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox providing 3D ConvNet-based local geometric descriptors for aligning 3D meshes and point clouds, essential for 3D reconstruction and geometric analysis.

tools.name: mvsnerf
tools.one_line_profile: Neural rendering for view synthesis and geometric reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A neural rendering approach that efficiently reconstructs geometric and neural radiance fields for view synthesis, applicable in scientific visualization and 3D reconstruction.

tools.name: ChemGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Agentic framework for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: An agentic framework designed to automate and manage computational chemistry and materials science workflows.

tools.name: dionysus
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of probabilistic model calibration on molecular datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing the calibration, performance, and generalizability of probabilistic models specifically on small molecular datasets, aiding in model validation.

tools.name: ani-1xnr
tools.one_line_profile: ML interatomic potential for reactive chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning interatomic potential designed for condensed-phase reactive chemistry simulations.

tools.name: monosdf
tools.one_line_profile: Monocular geometric cues for neural implicit surface reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A method for high-quality 3D surface reconstruction from monocular images using geometric cues and neural implicit representations.

tools.name: GeoDream
tools.one_line_profile: Disentangling 2D and geometric priors for 3D generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for high-fidelity and consistent 3D generation by disentangling 2D and geometric priors, useful for creating 3D assets and environments.

tools.name: pytorch_geometric_temporal
tools.one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal signal processing with GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A temporal extension of PyTorch Geometric for spatiotemporal signal processing, widely used in scientific modeling of dynamic systems.

tools.name: geometric-gnn-dojo
tools.one_line_profile: Design space exploration for Geometric GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A framework providing unified implementations and experiments to explore the design space of Geometric Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: Grassmann.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multilinear differential geometric algebra library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for Grassmann-Clifford-Hodge multilinear differential geometric algebra, used for mathematical physics and geometric computing.

tools.name: assay_inspector
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic assessment of data consistency in molecular datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing diagnostic assessments of data consistency and quality in molecular assay datasets.

tools.name: largeDFTdata
tools.one_line_profile: QM9 molecules and reactions data with 76 functionals
tools.detailed_description: A dataset repository containing DFT calculations for QM9 molecules and reactions using 76 functionals and 3 basis sets.

tools.name: FCGF
tools.one_line_profile: Fully Convolutional Geometric Features for 3D registration
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing fast and accurate 3D geometric features for point cloud registration and correspondence.

tools.name: GeoCalib
tools.one_line_profile: Single-image calibration with geometric optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning single-image camera calibration using geometric optimization techniques.

tools.name: GeometricTools
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computing in mathematics, geometry, and physics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive source code library for computing in the fields of mathematics, geometry, graphics, image analysis, and physics.

tools.name: dockstring
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and package for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and dataset for molecular docking, providing realistic benchmark tasks for drug discovery and machine learning.

tools.name: ganja.js
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Algebra Generator for JavaScript and other languages
tools.detailed_description: A Geometric Algebra generator supporting operator overloading and algebraic literals, useful for mathematical visualization and physics simulations.

tools.name: cgraphs
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of conserved H-bond networks in proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate, analyse, and compare conserved H-bond networks computed from datasets of static protein structures or molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: consistent_depth
tools.one_line_profile: Geometrically consistent depth estimation from video
tools.detailed_description: A tool for estimating dense, flicker-free, and geometrically consistent depth maps from monocular video sources.

tools.name: Geomstats
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Python package for computations and statistics on manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A library for geometric statistics and deep learning on manifolds (Lie groups, Riemannian manifolds, etc.), widely used in shape analysis, computational anatomy, and geometric deep learning for science.

tools.name: GMTKN55
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark database for main group thermochemistry, kinetics, and noncovalent interactions
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark database developed by the Grimme Lab, containing 55 subsets of main group thermochemistry, kinetics, and noncovalent interaction data for validating quantum chemical methods.

tools.name: ANI-1 Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of 20 million calculated off-equilibrium conformations for organic molecules
tools.detailed_description: A foundational dataset for training machine learning potentials in chemistry, containing DFT-calculated energies and forces for organic molecules in non-equilibrium conformations.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural network potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface allowing the use of ANI-1 neural network potentials within the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) for molecular dynamics and geometry optimization.

tools.name: Matbench Discovery
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for ML models simulating high-throughput materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark framework designed to evaluate machine learning models on the task of discovering stable inorganic crystals, simulating realistic high-throughput screening scenarios.

tools.name: GeomLoss
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric loss functions between point clouds, images, and volumes
tools.detailed_description: A library providing scalable implementations of geometric loss functions like Sinkhorn divergence and Wasserstein distance, essential for shape analysis, density fitting, and optimal transport in scientific ML.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evaluating LLMs on chemistry tasks
tools.detailed_description: An automated benchmark framework to evaluate the chemical knowledge and reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) against verified chemistry questions.

tools.name: geomeTRIC
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry optimization code with TRIC coordinate system
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for molecular geometry optimization, featuring the Translation-Rotation-Internal Coordinates (TRIC) system for efficient convergence in quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: Matbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for materials science property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for materials science, providing curated datasets and evaluation metrics for predicting various material properties using machine learning.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Learning Dataset of Molecules
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmark for few-shot learning in molecular property prediction, designed to evaluate models on their ability to generalize to new protein targets with limited data.

tools.name: OpenFF QCSubmit
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow tool for submitting molecules to QCFractal
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and workflow tool designed to automate the preparation and submission of molecular datasets to the QCFractal compute platform, facilitating large-scale quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: OpenFF ForceBalance
tools.one_line_profile: Automated force field parameter optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated parameterization of classical force fields using experimental and quantum chemical data, integrated with the QCArchive ecosystem for data retrieval.

tools.name: QASMBench
tools.one_line_profile: Low-level OpenQASM benchmark suite for NISQ evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating the performance and fidelity of NISQ (Noisy Intermediate-Scale Quantum) devices and simulators using OpenQASM representations.

tools.name: benchmark-qm
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for quantum chemistry packages
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and datasets designed to benchmark the performance and accuracy of various quantum chemistry software packages (e.g., Gaussian, ORCA).

tools.name: qm9pack
tools.one_line_profile: Data mining toolkit for the QM9 dataset
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing utilities for parsing, analyzing, and mining data from the QM9 quantum chemistry dataset.

tools.name: Ray Optics Simulation
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based 2D geometric optics simulation tool
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web application and simulation engine for creating and visualizing 2D geometric optical scenes, modeling light rays, lenses, and mirrors.

tools.name: gpaw-tools
tools.one_line_profile: GUI and workflow tools for GPAW DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly interface and collection of tools for conducting Density Functional Theory (DFT) and molecular dynamics (MD) calculations using the GPAW code.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing the MoleculeNet benchmark datasets and MolMapNet datasets, serving as a standard for evaluating machine learning models in chemistry.

tools.name: Matbench Genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics for benchmarking generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing standardized metrics for evaluating generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE benchmarks.

tools.name: TinyDFT
tools.one_line_profile: Minimalistic atomic Density Functional Theory code
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, educational, and functional implementation of atomic Density Functional Theory (DFT) in Python, suitable for understanding DFT internals and prototyping.

tools.name: Trident Chemwidgets
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter Widgets for molecular dataset interaction
tools.detailed_description: A set of interactive Jupyter widgets designed to facilitate the exploration, visualization, and filtering of molecular datasets directly within notebooks.

tools.name: BenchQC
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Toolkit for Quantum Computation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by NIST for benchmarking quantum computational devices, providing metrics and protocols for performance assessment.

tools.name: GauXC
tools.one_line_profile: Library for exchange-correlation energy evaluation in KS-DFT
tools.detailed_description: A modular C++ library for the efficient evaluation of exchange-correlation (XC) energies and potentials in Gaussian basis set Kohn-Sham DFT, supporting heterogeneous architectures.
